VALUES(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriterSeq}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') , #{boardUpdateMemberSeq}, 'N')

INSERT INTO FILE(FILE_BOARDSEQ, FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_DELETEFLAG)
